message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see the section "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which has three items:
- Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
- Ending Balance: -204229.08
- Net Increase: -8204229.08

The "Ending Balance" line item specifically shows the cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period, which is -204229.08.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-204229.08'} }
```
